months

Months of the year.

  • Install
  • Usage
  • Related projects
  • Running tests
  • Contributing
  • Author
  • License

(TOC generated by verb using markdown-toc)

Install

Install with npm:

$ npm i months --save

Usage

var months = require('months');

console.log(months);
//=> ['January', 'February', 'March', 'April', 'May', 'June', 'July', 'August', 'September', 'October', 'November', 'December']

console.log(months.abbr);
//=> ['Jan', 'Feb', 'Mar', 'Apr', 'May', 'Jun', 'Jul', 'Aug', 'Sep', 'Oct', 'Nov', 'Dec']

Related projects

  • days: Days of the week. | homepage
  • nanoseconds: Convert the process.hrtime array to a single nanoseconds value. | homepage
  • o-clock: Simple utility for displaying the time in 12-hour clock format. | homepage
  • pretty-time: Easily format the time from node.js process.hrtime. Works with timescales ranging from weeks to nanoseconds. | homepage
  • seconds: Get the number of seconds for a minute, hour, day and week. | homepage
  • time-stamp: Get a formatted timestamp. | homepage
  • week: Get the current week number. | homepage
  • year: Simple utility to get the current year with 2 or 4 digits. | homepage

Running tests

Install dev dependencies:

$ npm i -d && npm test

Contributing

Pull requests and stars are always welcome. For bugs and feature requests, please create an issue.
